name: Brain Damage Sumo Gunfight
description:
Enter the complicated world of Japanese culture. Become part of ordinary conflict-resolution situation, where sophisticated salarymen decide to solve a quarrel with some traditional Sumo Showdown to the death.

In the Land of the Rising Sun, where the sport of sumo is considered a national treasure, fighters that become incapacitated turn into respected personal guards (yojimbo), who sacrifice their lives in order to protect the honor of Japanese citizens.

Brain Damage Sumo Gunfight was created as a shooter-fighter mix for the TK Jam 2016, inspired by the "10 seconds" theme.

This is a 2-player only game, which requires two X360 controllers.
